trans-unit.source: Provides a basic designer loader interface that can be used to implement a custom designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface de carregador do estruturador básicos que pode ser utilizada para implementar um carregador de estruturador personalizado.

trans-unit.source: DesignerLoader can be implemented to support custom loading of a designer and designer components.
trans-unit.target: DesignerLoader pode ser implementado para suportar personalizado carregamento de um designer e componentes do designer.

trans-unit.source: A designer loader is also responsible for writing changes to an open document back to the storage the loader used when loading the document after the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Um carregador de estruturador é também responsável por ao escrever alterações para um documento abra novamente para o armazenamento de carregador utilizado ao carregar o documento após o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.Flush%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Visual Studio development environment creates its own variety of DesignerLoader that can load basic designer projects.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o ambiente de desenvolvimento de Visual Studio cria as suas próprias diversas DesignerLoader pode carregar projetos estruturador básicos.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom designer loader, you must inherit from and implement the abstract DesignerLoader class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um carregador de estruturador personalizado, tem de herdar e implementar a classe de DesignerLoader abstracta.

trans-unit.source: You cannot directly instantiate DesignerLoader, as it has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível instanciar diretamente a DesignerLoader, porque não tem nenhum construtor público.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is invoked, the designer loader loads the design document, displays the designer surface using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, and calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.EndLoad%2A> on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost> interface when done.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>é invocada, o carregador do estruturador carrega o documento de design, apresenta o estruturador superfície, utilizando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>interface e chamadas <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.EndLoad%2A>no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>Quando terminar de interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.EndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost> implementation is usually the same class that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>implementação é, normalmente, da mesma classe que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Begins loading a designer.
trans-unit.target: Começa a carregar um estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost> that is passed to the `host` parameter is typically the same object as the designer host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>é passado para o `host` parâmetro é, geralmente, o mesmo objeto como o anfitrião estruturador.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost>

trans-unit.source: Through this reference to the loader host, the designer loader can reload the design document and indicate that it has finished loading the design document.
trans-unit.target: Através desta referência para o anfitrião de carregador, o carregador do estruturador pode recarregar o documento de design e indicar que concluiu a carregar o documento de design.

trans-unit.source: The loader host through which this loader loads components.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião de carregador através do qual este carregador carrega componentes.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>foi occupying.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Writes cached changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em cache as alterações para a localização que o estruturador foi carregado a partir de.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls this method periodically to ensure that changes made to the document were saved by the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador chama este método periodicamente para garantir que as alterações efetuadas ao documento foram guardadas mediante o carregador do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: This method allows designer loaders to implement an asynchronous write scheme to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite carregadores estruturador implementar um esquema de escrita assíncrona para melhorar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida deste método não produz qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the loader is currently loading a document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o carregador está atualmente a carregar um documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the loader is currently loading a document; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o carregador está atualmente a carregar um documento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
